svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Human height vs life expectancy, 1910 to 1980
Shown on the x-axis is the average height of men born in the given year. Shown on the y-axis is the (period) life
expectancy at birth for both genders.
Source: Life expectancy, both genders - Clio Infra , University of Tuebingen: Height datahub (2015)
